title: Bug Parse IndexHTML
description:
adding ./LoggedInWelcome.html

comments.content:
What's the bug exactly?  Do you have a malformed/invalid HTML document that you tried to parse?  The 
output you provided shows the indexing process completing successfully.
comments.author: Erik Hatcher

comments.content:
I have to close this bug, as there was no further reply and it's impossible to 
do anything about this without more information.
comments.author: Daniel Naber
